benchmark_details.name: NaturalConv
benchmark_details.overview: NaturalConv is a Chinese multi-turn topic-driven conversation dataset designed for evaluating the ability of generating natural dialogues in varied scenarios. It contains 400K utterances from 19.9K conversations across six domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the ability of generating topic-driven, natural multi-turn conversations and to facilitate further research in dialogue systems.

data.source: Collected from news articles and generated by annotators simulating conversations.
data.annotation: Manually annotated dialogue by multiple participants.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the similarity between generated responses and reference dialogues.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in BLEU and F1 reflect better alignment with human responses, while lower scores indicate more variability.
methodology.baseline_results: Manual evaluation scores indicate a naturalness score of 2.8 on a scale of 1 to 3.
methodology.validation: Manual validation of dialogue naturalness was performed.
